mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myPet(myPetNum, num, subject, imageFileName) VALUES(myPet_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{subject}, #{imageFileName})
mapper.select:
SELECT mp.myPetNum, mp.subject, mp.imageFileName, mp.num, TO_CHAR(created, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as created FROM myPet mp
ORDER BY myPetNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT mp.myPetNum, md.nickName, md.userId, mp.subject, mp.hitCount, TO_CHAR(mp.created, 'yyyy.mm.dd') created, mp.num, mp.imageFileName FROM myPet mp JOIN memberDetail md ON md.num = mp.num WHERE mp.myPetNum=#{myPetNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE myPet mp SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE myPetNum = #{myPetNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT myPetNum, subject FROM myPet mp
AND (myPetNum > #{myPetNum})
ORDER BY myPetNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT myPetNum, subject FROM myPet mp
AND (myPetNum < #{myPetNum})
ORDER BY myPetNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE myPet SET subject=#{subject}, imageFileName=#{imageFileName} WHERE myPetNum=#{myPetNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM myPetLike WHERE myPetNum=#{myPetNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report(reportNum, boardSort, reportedPostNum, reporterNum, reportedNum, reasonSortNum) VALUES (report_seq.NEXTVAL, 2, #{reportedPostNum}, #{reporterNum}, #{reportedNum}, #{reasonSortNum})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report WHERE reportNum=#{reportNum}
